item.title: Why Boeing’s commercial-airplane business suffered another large loss even as revenue surged
item.description: Airplane deliveries rose and revenue surged while Boeing’s defense and space business showed strength. But losses were wider than expected.

item.title: I’m 53, a single parent with a $1 million home. My boyfriend wants to marry. Am I better off staying single?
item.description: “Should I just maintain the status quo or marry the love of my life?”

item.title: Some people are spending $200 on Halloween candy — and others are skipping the holiday — as ‘greedy’ trick-or-treaters spoil the fun
item.description: Forget those mini candy bars — these days, the pressure is on to dole out full-size versions.
